text: Everest is more than 200 kilometers from
the earthquake epicenter but still the
tremor has caused the worst disaster
ever on the mountain at just before noon
on Saturday hundreds of climbers were
spread out at Camp two here
lower down at Camp one traversing the
Khumbu Icefall and a base camp the
earthquake triggered a hanging glacier
to shear off this ridge between the two
peaks of Ramadi and Link Trent to the
west of base camp the avalanche of ice
and rock plunged down the slope straight
through the middle of base camp
flattening dozens of tents at least 17
people are confirmed dead so far with
more than 60 injured the most seriously
hurt climbers have been flown by
helicopter down the valley two for each
village the nearest medical facility
from there they're being transferred to
Katmandu for further treatment
